nodes.text: 501400272204364191972 was the identification code of a G-59 Cannibalizer starfighter that was used during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

The Cannibalizer was used by the Thaereian military. It was once flown by the Human Captain Delas Fotrin on a routine patrol near the moon Tilnes. However, it encountered an atmospheric disturbance, so Fotrin was forced to crash-land the Cannibalizer. It punctuated the crust and fell until it landed in a mineshaft that was located deep beneath the surface. Fotras recorded a short holographic message and then died soon afterwards
The starfighter, and Fotrin's body, were discovered about ten years later, by the Heroes of Cularin.
